title: The Horror Challenge Volume I
description: This first volume of The Horror Challenge includes 14 short stories stories that will provide the thrills you seek in a good horror tale. From the sentimental story of haunting - Spooky, and the comical alien abduction tale, Bob Saves The World, to the final story in this collection, you will find yourself wildly entertained with the stories created by JH Glaze in response to suggestions from his readers.Since The Horror Challenge stories are all suggested by reader input, this series is unlike any other ever created.
author: J.H. Glaze
